Html:
Hello,

Great library, I have been using GraphViz and would like my own interactive UI. One thing I can't work out is to how to space everything so they don't overlap, no matter what values I enter and can't seem to make it work. I am adding 100 or so vertices and they are just clumped in the middle, except when using the Circle layout.

I would like the size of the layout to expand according to the size of the graph with no overlap.

Any help appreciated.

Thanks
